title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.44 - Compliance with authorized traffic orders, signals, signs or directions required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.44 - Compliance with authorized traffic orders, signals, signs or directions required

State Regulations

Drivers of automotive vehicles in a truck terminal must
at all times comply with any lawful order, signal or direction of an authorized
representative of the Port Authority, and with any lights, signs or mechanical
or electrical signals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.44

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
